about_the_game:
The dwarfs from hell broke loose, the pursuit of the sinful soul began. They will torment her, enjoying the fading hope...

Sex with the Devil is a story-oriented game that tells about the difficult fate of a man who became a participant of the devil's sex carnival. You are waiting for a story full of drama, battles with evil, sex and despair.

The protagonist undergoes a session of psychological counseling and therapy, trying to heal the mental trauma of participating in a Devilish Sex Carnival.

Key features:
Beautiful and juicy demonesses;
An abundance of hot scenes;
A unique atmosphere of grotesque in the game incarnation of hell;
Explicit scenes of madness and ultra-violence;
Conversations with a psychologist;
The opportunity to get answers to many pressing questions;
Intriguing plot.

This game is a direct sequel to Sex with the Devil.
The game is a mixture of 3d visual novel with elements of horror (traveling through the dangerous labyrinths of hell).

Gameplay contains:
1. Conversation with the Devil and psychologist;
2. Hell game. For his entertainment the Devil will send you to his labyrinth, full of traps, and start a hunt. If you'll be able to find an exit, as a reward he will grant you one wish;

name: Sex with the Devil 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz (2 Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.33 Ghz (4 Core)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
